attributes.title: The Duck Song (full lyrics)
attributes.review:
A duck walked up to a lemonade stand
And he said to the man, running the stand
"Hey! (Bum bum bum) Got any grapes?"
The man said
"No we just sell lemonade. But it's cold
And it's fresh
And it's all home-made. Can I get you
Glass?"
The duck said,
"I'll pass".
Then he waddled away.
(Waddle waddle)
'Til the very next day.
(Bum bum bum bum ba-bada-dum)
When the duck walked up to the lemonade stand
And he said to the man running the stand,
"Hey! (Bum bum bum) Got any grapes?
The man said,
"No, like I said yesterday
We just sell lemonade OK?
Why not give it a try?"
The duck said,
"Goodbye."good day
Then he waddled away.
(Waddle waddle)
Then he waddled away.
(Waddle waddle)
Then he waddled away
(Waddle waddle)
'Til the very next day.
(Bum bum bum bum ba-ba-dum)
When the duck walked up to the lemonade stand
And he said to the man running the stand,
"Hey! (bum bum bum) Got any grapes?
The man said,
Look, this is getting old.
I mean, lemonade's all we've ever sold.
Why not give it a go?"
The duck said,
"How 'bout, no."
Then he waddled away
(Waddle waddle)
Then he waddled away.
(Waddle waddle waddle)
Then he waddled away
(Waddle waddle)
'Til the very next day.
(Bum bum bum bum ba-ba-dum)
When the duck walked up to the lemonade stand
And he said to the man running the stand,
"Hey! (Bum bum bum) Got any grapes?"
The man said,
"THAT'S IT!
If you don't stay away, duck,
I'll glue you to a tree and leave you there all day, stuck
So don't get to close!"
The duck said,
"Adios."
Then he waddled away.
(Waddle waddle)
Then he waddled away.
(Waddle waddle waddle)
Then he waddled away
(Waddle waddle)
'Til the very next day.
(Bum bum bum bum ba-ba-dum)
When the duck walked up to the lemonade stand
And he said to the man that was running the stand,
"Hey! (Bum bum bum) got any glue?"
"What"
"Got any glue?"
"No, why would I– oh!"
And one more question for you;
"Got any grapes?"
(Bum bum bum, bum bum bum)
And the man just stopped.
Then he started to smile.
He started to laugh.
He laughed for a while.
He said,
"Come on duck, let's walk to the store.
I'll buy you some grapes
So you won't have to ask anymore."
So they walked to the store
And the man bought some grapes.
He gave one to the duck and the duck said,
"Hmmm..No thanks. But you know what sounds good?
It would make my day.
Do you think this store
Do you think this store
Do you think this store has any lemonade?"
Then he waddled away.
(Waddle waddle)
Then he waddled away.
(Waddle waddle waddle)
Then he waddled away
(Waddle waddle)

attributes.title: Horrible app 🙄
attributes.review: Horrible it glitches so much to the point where I can’t even use it.and it made my phone crack to.i don’t get who would want this app

I hate This app I opened it and saw trump saying to MEEE if I wanted to see his peeeen I was like omg grosss then he showed me his pen. I was about to scream but thankfully it was just a really pen. So I continued to use the app for a month and a rat came up to me while I was using the app. This happened for another month. One day I opened the app again and I was FaceTiming him he said to me “hey Karen, I wanna give your daughter my pen” I said “the pen you showed me” .je showed my daughter something small and I still have 000000 idea was it was though. Then he said “don’t wear a mask” I agreed then he continued to say “you know I’m thinking about taking down no skateboarding signs at this point I lost it!!!!!! Really he was just gonna let kids skateboard... I asked to see the manager and he replied with “I AM THE MANAGER” I screamed so loud the cops came and asked what was wrong I told them and they looked out the window and saw a black kid skateboarding on MY property!!! They shot him. He died. HOORAY!!!!!! But then I saw a bunch of rats come inside my house and pee all over the police they all formed into the word gen z rules that’s right with a Z. Then a ugly deformed roach came in and the rats attacked it. The rat turned into all these terrible things. A McDonald’s worker came into my house and it scared all the gen z rats away. The roach turned into a trash can then into trump I slapped him with a pan. And he asked if I was pansexual. I said “NO!!!!” Trump tried to tell me that we should team up and take away their rights. I agreed but then disagreed once he throw teargas at me. Yesterday I found out why. He wanted to take a picture next to my cross that sits next to my white couch. Anyways vote 1 star to save tik tok

attributes.title: Registration Issues 7/8/20
attributes.review: Tried registering for the app, but it said my zip code was invalid and I had to keep refreshing in order to see the graphics 😒. Probably needs an update or something.

attributes.title: worst app 💥 E V E R 💥
attributes.review: since i have never gotten the hype about our 🤩💖⚡️bunker boy🧚🌸 i decided to download this app. right when i opened the app, my phone started blowing up with emails and texts from 🍊🌽donald🍤🦧 himself. i was beyond terrified with what kept happening to my phone. T H E N a virus 🦠 warning ⚠️ popped up in my screen. IT WAS DONALD TRUMP IN THE NUDE. I HAVE NEVER BEEN SO 🤮DISGUSTED🥴 IN MY ENTIRE LIFE. THE FACT THAT THIS A W F U L  MAN IS OUR PRESIDENT 💥BLOWS💥 MY 🧠 MIND. ✔️VOTE ✔️THIS 🧼FILTHY🧫 MAN OUT OF OFFICE.
